sentences.en: A flight of steps led upwards to the front door.
sentences.cn: 一段台阶往上通向正门。

sentences.en: A yellow tongue of flame shot upwards.
sentences.cn: 一条黄色的火舌直冲上天。

sentences.en: Hunter nodded again and gazed upwards in fear.
sentences.cn: 亨特又点了点头，满眼恐惧地朝上望去。

sentences.en: I can see things just going onwards and upwards for us now.
sentences.cn: 我认为从现在起我们的境况只会越来越好。

sentences.en: Inflation will bound back upwards next year.
sentences.cn: 明年通货膨胀将重新加剧.

sentences.en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
My ambition was to travel upwards in the ecclesiastical hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 我的雄心是在教会中一步一步往上走。

sentences.en: Pointing upwards, he indicated a large nest high in the tree.
sentences.cn: 他朝上指指，示意树上高处有个大鸟窝。

sentences.en: She caught a clear view upwards of the spotlit temple.
sentences.cn: 她抬头清楚地看到了被聚光灯照得通明的寺庙。

sentences.en: The council has revised its projections of funding requirements upwards.
sentences.cn: 地方议会调高了对资金需求的预测.

sentences.en: The divorce rate is spiralling upwards.
The loss is estimated to reach upwards of 30000 yuan.
The path began to climb steeply upwards.
The share price is likely to leap upwards.
sentences.cn: 该股票价格可能会猛涨。
这条小道蜿蜒而上，很危险。

sentences.en: The trend of prices is still upwards.
sentences.cn: 物价的趋向是仍在上涨.

trans.tran_cn: 向上地，上升地，在上面，向上头
trans.tran_en: moving or pointing towards a higher position
